---
author: ChuckPR
title: dplyR has as <code>cume_dist</code> function
date: 2024-10-17
---

Useful for making [ECDF charts](https://ericmjl.github.io/blog/2018/7/14/ecdfs/) in combination with `geom_step`.

```{r}
#| fig-align: "center"
suppressPackageStartupMessages(
  library('tidyverse')
)
library('palmerpenguins')

penguins |>
  group_by(species) |>
  mutate(cumedist = cume_dist(body_mass_g)) |>
ggplot(aes(x = body_mass_g, y = cumedist, color = species)) +
  geom_step(direction = 'vh') +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = 'Set2') +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 16)
```
